scripts.clean:debug:
reset; echo "==========
Cleaning solution: Debug ...
==========
" ; /bin/bash -vc "rm -rf ./app ; dotnet clean -c Debug ./src/poc/poc.csproj ; dotnet clean -c Debug ./src/ycs/ycs.csproj"
scripts.clean:release:
reset; echo "==========
Cleaning solution: Release ...
==========
" ; /bin/bash -vc "rm -rf ./app ; dotnet clean -c Release ./src/poc/poc.csproj ; dotnet clean -c Release ./src/ycs/ycs.csproj"
scripts.build:debug:
reset; echo "==========
Building solution: Debug ...
==========
" ; /bin/bash -vc "dotnet publish -c Debug -o ./app --self-contained true --use-current-runtime ./src/poc/poc.csproj"
scripts.build:release:
reset; echo "==========
Cleaning solution: Release ...
==========
" ; /bin/bash -vc "dotnet publish -c Release -o ./app --self-contained true --use-current-runtime ./src/poc/poc.csproj"
